turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool, I would like to order pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What are we doing today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size are you wanting?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like I would like a medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and how many?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what toppings are going to be on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I just get like a pineapple pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, that's going to be an extra $2.40 for premium okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's going to be $2.40 for what?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Premium toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is what is the premium topping?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pineapple is considered a premium topping unless you get a hawaiian.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh. All right, and can I get extra cheese on both of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing, that's two pineapple pizzas, medium, with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also, can I get bacon on both of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's now two hawaiian pizzas with extra cheese, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderful, your total will be $25.33.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great time.
